subject: Soccer
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Playing without the injured Neymar, Barcelona was held to a 0-0 draw by Getafe. The team is now 4 points behind Real Madrid at the top of the standings in La Liga.
snippet: Playing without the injured Neymar, Barcelona was held to a 0-0 draw by Getafe. The team is now 4 points behind Real Madrid at the top of the standings in La Liga.
